text: Oh! Oh!
I just cannot believe
that Clark stood me up.
He may still show up.
Oh, what are you, stupid?

- It's been three hours.
- Is that all?

Let's just go on
to happier things, okay?

Um, why don't you tell me
about your lovely wedding?

Well, actually, uh,
there was something

that we wanted to
tell you about the wedding.
Um, it's going to be
a-a small ceremony.
Uh, tiny.

We're not even sure
why we're having it.

It's actually going
to be just family.
Oh, wait..
You two think of me as family?

Oh! I have to ask you
something now, and be honest.
Do you want me to sing

"Careless Whisper"
or "Lady in Red"?

How can you say that?
The Mets have no closer.
What about Benitez?

What about game one
of the Series?

- What about, shut up?
- You shut up.
I love arguing with her.

- Be right back.
- Okay.
So, how's it going with Joey?
Oh, okay.
Okay?

Wait, okay, tell me, tell me
that you like him, please.

I mean, tell me
that you like him.

Look, he's a really
great guy, and I know that

you really want this
to work out

but I just don't see
this having a future.
What?

But you said that
you liked him.
I mean, what happened?
Did you just change your mind?

- Kinda.
- Then change it back!

I'm sorry. I.. It's just
there's no real spark.

No spark? Didn't you
sleep together?
Yeah.
Uh, tramp.
Does Joey have any idea?

I really don't think he does,
and you know what?

Maybe you guys could
help pool him in

you know, tell him
I'm-I'm not interested

in a serious relationship
or something.

Yeah, you mean, like,
that you're kind of a loner?

- Yeah, that'd be great.
- Yeah.

And maybe that
you're a real stronzo.

- I'm sorry?
- Oh, well.

I guess Italian isn't
one of the four
languages you speak.

- Hey. Wanna go?
- Yeah, let's go.

- Okay. See you guys later.
- Bye, guys.
Hey, thank you so much.
Wow.

I guess it wasn't Cupid 
that brought her here.

No, just a regular
old flying dwarf.
[instrumental music]

Yes, yes.
How can I help you?

We were, we were just
looking around.

Oh, oh, you're-you're
fellow scholars.

What exactly
were you looking for? Hmm?
Perhaps, uh, perhaps..
...Dr. Chester Stock's musings
on the Smilodon californicus?

- Uh..
- Uh! Uh!
Get out of here!
Uh, meeting someone?

Or-or are you
just here to brush up

on Merriam's views
on evolution?

Um, actually,
I find Merriam's views
far too progressionist.

I find Merriam's views
far too progressionist.

[chuckles]
I'm sorry. Who are you?

I'm a professor here.
Ross Geller.

Ross Geller?
Why do I know that name?

It's a..
Wait!
Did you write this?
Yes.

You're the person
who checked out my book?
You know, you look nothing
like I would have thought.
You're, you're so young.

Well, I, uh,
I skipped fourth grade.
I am very, very sorry.
